name: Shooty McShooterface
description:
Hey, do you like shooting asteroids in space while flying around in a blue spaceship? Well, I have the game for you! Check out this game Shooty McShooterface, a game all about shooting asteroids in space while flying about in a blue spaceship.

Isn't flying a spaceship hard?

Heck no! Just use WASD to expertly maneuver your spaceship through the fastness of space and left mouse button to fire a barrage of laser beams at unsuspecting asteroids. Burst them into fragments until they are no longer! Asteroids will bump into each other, dealing damage, and occasionally destroying each other. Don't be alarmed, this is the life cycle of the asteroid and it's perfectly natural.
